00091 enum
00092 {

00094       IN_THE_BEGINNING_1,
00095       IN_THE_BEGINNING_2,

00129 BOOLEAN EnterAimHistory()
00130 {
00131   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00132 
00133       gfExitingAimHistory = FALSE;
00134       InitAimDefaults();
00135       InitAimHistoryMenuBar();
00136 
00137       // load the Content Buttons graphic and add it
00138       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00139       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\ContentButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00140       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiContentButton));
00141 
00142       gubCurPageNum = (UINT8) giCurrentSubPage;
00143       RenderAimHistory();
00144 
00145 
00146       DisableAimHistoryButton();
00147       gubAimHistoryMenuButtonDown   = 255;
00148 
00149       return(TRUE);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void ExitAimHistory()
00153 {
00154       gfExitingAimHistory = TRUE;
00155       RemoveAimDefaults();
00156       ExitAimHistoryMenuBar();
00157       
00158       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiContentButton);
00159       giCurrentSubPage = gubCurPageNum;
00160       
00161       if(gfInToc)
00162             ExitTocMenu();
00163 
00164 }

00171 void RenderAimHistory()
00172 {
00173       wchar_t     sText[400];
00174       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00175       UINT16      usPosY;
00176 
00177       DrawAimDefaults();
00178 //    DrawAimHistoryMenuBar();
00179       DisplayAimSlogan();
00180       DisplayAimCopyright();
00181 
00182       DrawTextToScreen(AimHistoryText[AIM_HISTORY_TITLE], AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_X, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_Y, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_HISTORY_TITLE_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00183 
00184 
00185       switch(gubCurPageNum)
00186       {
00187             // History Page TOC
00188             case 0:
00189                   InitTocMenu();
00190                   break;
00191 
00192             //Load and Display the begining 
00193             case 1:
00194                   DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(IN_THE_BEGINNING, 2);
00195                   break;
00196 
00197             //Load and Display the island of metavira 
00198             case 2:
00199                   DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(THE_ISLAND_METAVIRA, 2);
00200                   break;
00201 
00202             //Load and Display the gus tarballs 
00203             case 3:
00204                   DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(GUS_TARBALLS, 2);
00205                   break;
00206 
00207             //Load and Display the founder 
00208             case 4:
00209                   DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(WORD_FROM_FOUNDER, 1);
00210 
00211                   // display coloniel Mohanned...
00212                   usPosY = AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_Y + (GetFontHeight(AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT) + 2)* 5 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y;
00213                   uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * COLONEL_MOHANNED;
00214                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00215                   DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, iScreenHeightOffset + 210+LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00216                   break;
00217 
00218             //Load and Display the incorporation
00219             case 5:
00220                   DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(INCORPORATION, 2);
00221       
00222                   // display dunn and bradbord...
00223                   uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * DUNN_AND_BRADROAD;
00224                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00225                   DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, iScreenHeightOffset + 270+LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00226 
00227                   //AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_Y
00228                   uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * INCORPORATION_3;
00229                   LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00230                   DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, iScreenHeightOffset + 290+LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00231                   break;
00232       }
00233 
00234   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00235 
00236       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00237 
00238   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00239 }

00244 BOOLEAN InitAimHistoryMenuBar(void)
00245 {
00246   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00247       UINT16                              i, usPosX;
00248 
00249       // load the Bottom Buttons graphic and add it
00250       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00251       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BottomButton.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00252       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBottomButton));
00253 
00254       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00255       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BottomButton2.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00256       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBottomButton2));
00257 
00258       guiHistoryMenuButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BottomButtons2.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00259       usPosX = AIM_HISTORY_MENU_X;
00260       for(i=0; i<AIM_HISTORY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00261       {
00262 //          guiHistoryMenuButton[i] = QuickCreateButton(guiHistoryMenuButtonImage, usPosX, AIM_HISTORY_MENU_Y,
00263 //                                                                                                    BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00264 //                                                                                                    DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, (GUI_CALLBACK)BtnHistoryMenuButtonCallback);
00265 //          SetButtonCursor(guiHistoryMenuButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00266 //          MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiHistoryMenuButton[i], 0, i+1);
00267 
00268             guiHistoryMenuButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiHistoryMenuButtonImage, AimHistoryText[i+AIM_HISTORY_PREVIOUS], FONT10ARIAL, 
00269                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_ON_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00270                                                                                      AIM_BUTTON_OFF_COLOR, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00271                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00272                                                                                      usPosX, AIM_HISTORY_MENU_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00273                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHistoryMenuButtonCallback);
00274             SetButtonCursor(guiHistoryMenuButton[i], CURSOR_WWW);
00275             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiHistoryMenuButton[i], 0, i+1);
00276             
00277             
00278             usPosX += AIM_HISTORY_GAP_X;
00279 
00280       }
00281 
00282       return(TRUE);
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 BOOLEAN ExitAimHistoryMenuBar(void)
00287 {
00288       int i;
00289 
00290 //    DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiHistoryMenuButtonImage);
00291       UnloadButtonImage( guiHistoryMenuButtonImage );
00292 
00293 
00294       for(i=0; i<AIM_HISTORY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00295             RemoveButton( guiHistoryMenuButton[i] );
00296 
00297       return(TRUE);
00298 }

00300 
00301 void SelectHistoryMenuButtonsRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00302 { 
00303       UINT8 rValue;
00304       static BOOLEAN fOnPage=TRUE;
00305 
00306       if(fOnPage)
00307       {
00308             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00309             {
00310             }
00311             else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00312             {
00313                   rValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00314                   //Previous Page
00315                   if( rValue == 1 )
00316                   {
00317                         if( gubCurPageNum > 0)
00318                         {
00319                               gubCurPageNum--;
00320                               ChangingAimHistorySubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00321 //                            RenderAimHistory();
00322                         }
00323                   }
00324 
00325                   // Home Page
00326                   else if( rValue == 2 )
00327                   {
00328                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
00329                   }
00330                   //Company policies
00331                   else if( rValue == 3 )
00332                   {
00333                         guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_POLICIES;
00334                   }
00335                   //Next Page
00336                   else if( rValue == 4 )
00337                   {
00338                         if( gubCurPageNum < NUM_AIM_HISTORY_PAGES )
00339                         {
00340                               gubCurPageNum++;
00341                               ChangingAimHistorySubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00342 
00343                               fOnPage = FALSE;
00344                               if(gfInToc)
00345                               {
00346                                     ExitTocMenu();
00347                               }
00348                               fOnPage = TRUE;
00349 //                            RenderAimHistory();
00350                         }
00351                   }
00352             }
00353             else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00354             {
00355             } 
00356       }
00357 }

00359 
00360 BOOLEAN DisplayAimHistoryParagraph(UINT8  ubPageNum, UINT8 ubNumParagraphs)
00361 {
00362       wchar_t     sText[400];
00363       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00364       UINT16      usPosY=0;
00365       UINT16      usNumPixels=0;
00366 
00367       //title
00368       uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * ubPageNum;
00369       LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00370       DrawTextToScreen(sText, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, AIM_HISTORY_SUBTITLE_Y, 0, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_TITLE_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00371 
00372       if(ubNumParagraphs >= 1)
00373       {
00374             usPosY = AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_Y;
00375             //1st paragraph
00376             uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * (ubPageNum + 1 );
00377             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00378             usNumPixels = DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, usPosY, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00379       }
00380 
00381       if(ubNumParagraphs >= 2)
00382       {
00383             //2nd paragraph
00384             usPosY += usNumPixels + AIM_HISTORY_SPACE_BETWEEN_PARAGRAPHS;                 
00385             uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * (ubPageNum + 2 );
00386             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00387             DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, usPosY, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00388       }
00389 
00390       if(ubNumParagraphs >= 3)
00391       {
00392             //3rd paragraph
00393             usPosY += usNumPixels + AIM_HISTORY_SPACE_BETWEEN_PARAGRAPHS;                 
00394 
00395             uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * (ubPageNum + 3 );
00396             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00397             DisplayWrappedString(AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_X, usPosY, AIM_HISTORY_PARAGRAPH_WIDTH, 2, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00398       }
00399                   
00400       return(TRUE);
00401 }

00404 
00405 BOOLEAN InitTocMenu()
00406 {
00407       UINT16                  i, usPosY;
00408       UINT16                  usHeight;
00409       UINT16                  usWidth=0;
00410       UINT32                  uiStartLoc=0;
00411       wchar_t                 sText[400];
00412       UINT8                   ubLocInFile[]=
00413                                                 {IN_THE_BEGINNING,
00414                                                  THE_ISLAND_METAVIRA,
00415                                                  GUS_TARBALLS,
00416                                                  WORD_FROM_FOUNDER,
00417                                                  INCORPORATION};
00418 
00419   HVOBJECT        hContentButtonHandle;
00420 
00421       GetVideoObject(&hContentButtonHandle, guiContentButton);
00422 
00423       usHeight = GetFontHeight(AIM_HISTORY_TOC_TEXT_FONT);
00424       usPosY = AIM_HISTORY_CONTENTBUTTON_Y;
00425       for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_HISTORY_PAGES; i++)
00426       {
00427             uiStartLoc = AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE * ubLocInFile[i];
00428             LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(AIMHISTORYFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, AIM_HISTORY_LINE_SIZE);
00429       
00430             usWidth = StringPixLength(sText, AIM_HISTORY_TOC_TEXT_FONT);
00431 
00432             //if the mouse regions havent been inited, init them
00433             if( !gfInToc )
00434             {
00435                   //Mouse region for the history toc buttons
00436                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedHistoryTocMenuRegion[i], AIM_HISTORY_TOC_X, usPosY, (UINT16)(AIM_HISTORY_TOC_X + AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00437                                                        CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectHistoryTocMenuRegionCallBack); 
00438                   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedHistoryTocMenuRegion[i]); 
00439                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedHistoryTocMenuRegion[i], 0, i+1);
00440             }
00441 
00442         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hContentButtonHandle, 0,AIM_HISTORY_TOC_X, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00443             DrawTextToScreen(sText, AIM_HISTORY_TOC_X, (UINT16)(usPosY + AIM_HISTORY_TOC_Y), AIM_CONTENTBUTTON_WIDTH, AIM_HISTORY_TOC_TEXT_FONT, AIM_HISTORY_TOC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00444 
00445 
00446             usPosY += AIM_HISTORY_TOC_GAP_Y;
00447       }
00448       gfInToc = TRUE;
00449       return(TRUE);
00450 }
00451 
00452 
00453

00455 
00456 BOOLEAN ExitTocMenu()
00457 {
00458       UINT16 i;
00459 
00460       if( gfInToc )
00461       {
00462             gfInToc = FALSE;
00463             for(i=0; i<NUM_AIM_HISTORY_PAGES; i++)
00464                   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedHistoryTocMenuRegion[i]);
00465       }
00466 
00467       return(TRUE);
00468 }

00470 
00471              
00472 void SelectHistoryTocMenuRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00473 { 
00474       if(gfInToc)
00475       {
00476             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00477             {
00478             }
00479             else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00480             {
00481                   gubCurPageNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
00482                   ChangingAimHistorySubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00483 
00484                   ExitTocMenu();
00485                   ResetAimHistoryButtons();
00486 //                RenderAimHistory();
00487                   DisableAimHistoryButton();
00488             }
00489             else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
00490             {
00491             }
00492       }
00493 }
00494 
00495 
00496 void BtnHistoryMenuButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00497 {
00498       UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00499       gubAimHistoryMenuButtonDown = 255;
00500 
00501       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00502       {
00503             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00504 
00505             gubAimHistoryMenuButtonDown = ubRetValue;
00506             
00507             InvalidateRegion(AIM_HISTORY_MENU_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_Y, AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_Y);
00508       }
00509       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00510       {
00511             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00512             {
00513                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00514                   ResetAimHistoryButtons();
00515 
00516                         if( ubRetValue == 1 )
00517                         {
00518                               if( gubCurPageNum > 0)
00519                               {
00520                                     gubCurPageNum--;
00521                                     ChangingAimHistorySubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00522 
00523 //                                  RenderAimHistory();
00524                                     ResetAimHistoryButtons();
00525                               }
00526                               else
00527                                     btn->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00528                         }
00529 
00530                         // Home Page
00531                         else if( ubRetValue == 2 )
00532                         {
00533                               guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM;
00534                         }
00535                         //Company policies
00536                         else if( ubRetValue == 3 )
00537                         {
00538                               guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_ARCHIVES;
00539                         }
00540                         //Next Page
00541                         else if( ubRetValue == 4 )
00542                         {
00543                               if( gubCurPageNum < NUM_AIM_HISTORY_PAGES )
00544                               {
00545                                     gubCurPageNum++;
00546                                     ChangingAimHistorySubPage( gubCurPageNum );
00547 
00548                                     if(gfInToc)
00549                                     {
00550                                           ExitTocMenu();
00551                                     }
00552 //                                  RenderAimHistory();
00553                               }
00554                               else
00555                                     btn->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00556 
00557                         }
00558 
00559                   DisableAimHistoryButton();
00560 
00561                   InvalidateRegion(AIM_HISTORY_MENU_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_Y, AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_Y);
00562             }
00563       }
00564       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00565       {
00566             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00567 
00568             DisableAimHistoryButton();
00569 
00570             InvalidateRegion(AIM_HISTORY_MENU_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_Y, AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_X,AIM_HISTORY_MENU_END_Y);
00571       }
00572 } 
00573 
00574 
00575 void ResetAimHistoryButtons()
00576 {
00577       int i=0;
00578 
00579       for(i=0; i<AIM_HISTORY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT; i++)
00580       {
00581             ButtonList[ guiHistoryMenuButton[i] ]->uiFlags &= ~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON; 
00582       }
00583 }
00584 
00585 void DisableAimHistoryButton()
00586 {
00587       if( gfExitingAimHistory == TRUE)
00588             return;
00589 
00590       if( (gubCurPageNum == 0 ) )
00591       {
00592             ButtonList[ guiHistoryMenuButton[ 0 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00593       }
00594       else if(  ( gubCurPageNum == 5) ) 
00595       {
00596             ButtonList[ guiHistoryMenuButton[ AIM_HISTORY_MENU_BUTTON_AMOUNT-1 ] ]->uiFlags |= (BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00597       }
00598 }

00601 
00602 void ChangingAimHistorySubPage( UINT8 ubSubPageNumber )
00603 {
00604       fLoadPendingFlag = TRUE;
00605 
00606       if( AimHistorySubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] == FALSE )
00607       {
00608             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00609             fFastLoadFlag = FALSE;
00610 
00611             AimHistorySubPagesVisitedFlag[ ubSubPageNumber ] = TRUE;
00612       }
00613       else
00614       {
00615             fConnectingToSubPage = TRUE;
00616             fFastLoadFlag = TRUE;
00617       }
00618 }
